name: PROTO-R V1
description:
The National Ministry of Space Defense R&D team have developed a new prototype for a returning-to-life device and you were the chosen one to test it before releasing it to a new mission! Just remember that in order to activate its returning features, you have to sacrifice one of the device-modifiers that you grabbed along the way!

Learn from your mistakes, avoid all damage, trace a route and make new strategies to get the highest score. To end a game does not mean to loose all your assets!

---

Controls

Keyboard+Mouse:

- WASD: Movement

- Left Click: Select/Shoot

Gamepad:

- Left Stick / D-Pad: Movement

- A/B buttons: Select/Shoot

---

Credits:

- Design and programming: Michael Woo

- Additional resources for programming: Joseph Hacking

- Music: 8-bit music free by Cron Audio

- Art and SFX: The GOAT Kenney!

---

Thank you for playing the game! I hope you enjoy it!
